name: DOLE PLANTATION
description:
Enhance your visit to Dole Plantation, Hawaii's Complete Pineapple Experience!
* Take the Pineapple Maze challenge as you visit the World's Largest Maze!
- Time your Maze visit!
- Print out your Maze results!
- Share your results with the world via Facebook and email!
* Enjoy an audio tour of the Plantation Garden!
